doc.field: A-147, Nh-8, Mahipalpur New Delhi Delhi N.C.R 110037 India

This hotel is located in New Delhi (Mahipalpur), near the airport, AMBI Mall, Fortis Hospital, and DLF Emporio Vasant Kunj. Local attractions also include DLF Promenade Vasant Kunj and Jawaharlal Nehru University.
23, Old Airport Road, Kodihalli, 3rd Cross Rd, HAL 3rd Stage, Kodihalli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008
The Leela Palace Bangalore is one of the leading 5 star hotels in Bangalore set over nine acres of garden for the ultimate palace experience word class dining
Embassy Golf Links Business Park Bengaluru Karnataka 560071 India

This luxury hotel is located in the heart of Bengaluru, walking distance from Dell Offices, Fidelity Business Services, and Embassy Golf Link Business Park. Also nearby are Goldman Sachs Offices and Karnataka Golf Course.
